review: I visited the clinic for my gum bleeding issues .Doctor suggested to go with laser gum treatment.2visit procedure was done. Now the gums feels better n bleeding gums .

I went for tooth pain while chewing in the right side. doctor kishor he examined my teeth properly and found out the hidden cavity which is present in right side upper jaw. the cavity is small and present inbetween the teeth. this cavity is not visible to my eyes when I see in the mirror since it is formed under the upper jaw back side. He found out the cavity and took the pic in his iPhone and later he also took x-ray for that teeth which cost 400. Finally I saw the pic and shocked to see the cavity (Black colour). After that the chief doctor came and inspected. Finally they suggested for RCT. The Quality of treatment is good but cost is too high compared to other dental clinics in the same area and city.

I went for getting my filling done on 3 teeths. Thanks to Dr.Kishore, for guiding me regarding the problems faced due to cavities and the treatment was painless and I would recommend the Dentist for Rct and cavity related issues.

Great care @ family dental care, highly recommended place on horamavu main road,  Doctors are highly skilled n experienced.  I had good overall experience , Dr Abhinav Diwan, Dr Archana Diwan, Dr Kishore n rest of staff all go extra mile to help u. Place is neat n clean, open 24/7 for emergency tooth pain also.
Very nice clínic with nice ambience n doctors. Like family they take care. Dr Kishor is a experiênced doctor who hás good handwork n takes caré of all patients.
Dr Kishore is an experienced root canal specialist, he is very caring n gentle, My procedure was handled professionally n without any problem. Definitely recommended.

review: I visited the clinic with a bad tooth ache dr kishor attended and suggested for wisdom tooth extraction. The procedure was smooth and painless . Thanks to doctor and team.
